Sentencas: The LSGM powders by doping 0-2.5 at.% of MoO3 were synthesized and investigated.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: The microstructure and electrical properties of the samples were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), field-emission scanning electron microscopy (FE-SEM) and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) respectively.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: The results showed that the phase purity, densification and conductivity of the LSGM samples could be improved by a proper addition of MoO3.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: The LSGM specimen by doping 2 at.% MoO3 exhibited the best phase purity, the best density, the largest grain size and the lowest activation energy.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: Moreover, it was found that the conductivity of the LSGM by doping 2 at.% MoO3 was 3.91 x 10(-4)
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 450 degrees C, which was 2.82 times as high as LSGM without MoO3 doping.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: Moreover, the thermal expansion coefficient of the LSGM-2Mo sample changed little by MoO3 doping.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant

Sentencas: Therefore, the MoO3 doped LSGM may be a potential electrolyte material for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) without requiring buffer layer between anode and electrolyte.
Titulo: Improvement in the sintering and electrical properties of strontium- and magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate by MoO3 dopant
